thread.title: BRIEF-Student Transportation To Be Acquired By Group Of Investors Led By CDPQ

title: BRIEF-Student Transportation To Be Acquired By Group Of Investors Led By CDPQ
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Student Transportation Inc:
* TO BE ACQUIRED BY A GROUP OF INVESTORS LED BY CDPQ * ‍SHAREHOLDERS OF STI WILL RECEIVE US$7.50 PER COMMON SHARE IN CASH​
* ‍TERMINATION PAYMENT OF US$28.4 MILLION WILL BE PAYABLE BY STI TO PURCHASER GROUP SHOULD DEAL NOT CLOSE IN SOME CIRCUMSTANCES​
* ‍PART OF CONSIDERATION IS TO BE FUNDED WITH EQUITY COMMITMENTS FROM PURCHASER GROUP​
* ‍REMAINDER OF CONSIDERATION WILL BE FUNDED WITH COMMITTED DEBT FINANCING BY BMO CAPITAL MARKETS​
* ‍BOARD OF STI HAS UNANIMOUSLY APPROVED ARRANGEMEN​T Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
